717263f-a.text:
Broadway, north across Grand Street, showing mainly the westerly side of this thoroughfare. At the left is the five story Grand Building, at the N.W. corner. In the right background is the spire of Grace P. E. Church at 10th Street. This photo is taken during the period when this section was the center of the shopping district, prior to their removal up Broadway.
About 1870
American Studio, photo
87 Nassau St., N.Y.C.
Gift of Urbrock Collection
REPRODUCTION RIGHTS UNKNOWN

(Handwritten notes)
